channel.title: Awards request
channel.description:
This is for my site javacisnotrecognized.com that i decided to attempt at re-building.
[quote="Thug life"]Well as we have added more boards, we of course will need some more awards for those people who enjoy and are active in certain sections or show a particular skill in a certain subject.
These are the following awards that are needed.
[ul][li]IRC Operator - Awarded to Operators of our IRC channels - this includes halfops.[/li] [li]Graphics expert[/li] [li]Media Master[/li] [li]Community moderator[/li] [li]Help cup[/li] [li]One for the Guides/tutorial section, need help on a name :D[/li] [li]Ex Staff[/li] [li]SOTW[/li][/ul]
[img]http://www.javacisnotrecognized.com/Themes/default/images/java.gif[/img] I need the awards to look like this (Of course without the java bit but with an icon that represents that award :))
The winner of these competitions will receive the graphics award, and a custom title.[/quote] Thanks to anyone who helps :)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 04:13:43 PM[/size][hr][img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/4408/awardrr3.jpg[/img] Thats the best stock image i could get, if you could make the white around it transparent and ad the logos that relate to the award that you are making, if anyone is interested that is.

This is for my site javacisnotrecognized.com that i decided to attempt at re-building.

[quote=“Thug life”]Well as we have added more boards, we of course will need some more awards for those people who enjoy and are active in certain sections or show a particular skill in a certain subject.

These are the following awards that are needed.

I need the awards to look like this (Of course without the java bit but with an icon that represents that award :))

The winner of these competitions will receive the graphics award, and a custom title.[/quote]
